text: e. Due to interracial difficulties between the Annu-Melchizedek and the Serres-Egyptian majorities, the Halls of Amenti were once again closed and mass preparation for ascension was curtailed. When the Templar Seals were applied in 8,000 BC, guardianship of the Arc of the Covenant was transferred out of the hands of the Annu- Melchizedeks and Hebrew races into the protection of the Serres-Egyptians and Cloister Family Melchizedeks (those born through the Sphere of Amenti Melchizedek Cloister after the Annu and Hebrew morphogenetic fields had been removed). Previously the four races shared responsibility and accessibil- ity to the Arc of the Covenant, but following the Templar Seal only Cloister Melchizedeks and Serres-Egyptians were permitted direct involvement with 85
